name: Punch
display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

name: Haymaker
display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

name: Tremor
display_help: A tremendous attack. Tremor shakes the very Earth itself, damaging and knocking back everything in a nearby area.

name: Fault
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Stone_Spears
display_help: The Caster can cause Stone Spears to erupt around an enemy target and all nearby foes. The Stone Spears deal moderate lethal damage.

name: Seismic_Smash
display_help: You have been Knocked out and rendered helpless by Atta's Seismic Smash.

name: Hurl_Boulder
display_help: The Troll can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.

name: Fast_Healing
display_help: The Troll naturally heals at a faster than a normal rate. This power is always on and does not need to activated.

name: Temp_Invulnerability
display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

name: Resistance
display_help: Resistance

name: Resistance
display_help: Resistance

name: Punch
display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

name: Haymaker
display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

name: Hurl_Boulder
display_help: The Troll can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.

name: Invincible
display_help: While this power is active, the Troll receives a huge bonus to Defense and can resist most controlling effects like Holds, Sleeps, Disorient, Immobilization and Knockback.

name: Hurl
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

name: Punch
display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

name: Integration
display_help: When activated, the Troll becomes resistant to Knockback, Disorient Hold, Sleep and Immobilization for a short duration.

name: Fast_Healing
display_help: The Troll naturally heals at a faster than a normal rate. This power is always on and does not need to activated.

name: Stone_Fist
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Stone_Mallet
display_help: The Outcast Summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.

name: Stone_Spears
display_help: The Caster can cause Stone Spears to erupt around an enemy target and all nearby foes. The Stone Spears deal moderate lethal damage.

name: Hurl_Boulder
display_help: The Troll can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.

name: Rock_Armor
display_help: While this power is active, the Outcast's skin becomes Stone. Rock Armor make the Outcast highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Outcast.

name: Resistance
display_help: Resistance

name: Baseball_Bat
display_help: There is nothing like slugging someone in the head with this baseball bat.

name: Boxing
display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

name: Jab
display_help: The Troll has Disoriented you.

name: Heavy_Revolver
display_help: Large caliber sidearm. Slower than a standard pistol, but can knock down foes.

name: Revolver
display_help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.

name: Shotgun
display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.

name: Sledgehammer
display_help: This heavy, but unwieldy and slow Sledgehammer can knock down foes.

name: Submachine_Gun
display_help: Rapid fire rifle. Can reduce targets defense.
